name: idemeum
headline: Passwordless application management platform.
description:
idemeum is a Passwordless Application Management platform. Our vision is to provide a single place for small and medium businesses (SMBs) to set up and manage employee access to SaaS apps.

Behind the scenes we connect to any HR system and automate employee onboarding and account provisioning. Employees leverage mobile device biometrics to access any type of app - free or paid. 

Instead of deploying multiple tools for SSO, password management, and passwordless access, idemeum offers one platform to do it all.

founders.name: Nik Poturnak, Founder
founders.description: Passionate about building security products. Led product teams at VMware, Facebook, FireEye, and Cisco.

founders.name: Jagjit Sethi, Founder
founders.description: Jagjit Sethi is the co-founder and CTO of Idemeum, a passwordless Identity Provider for small and medium businesses. Prior to Idemeum, Jagjit was a Director of Engineering at VMware where he was responsible for building Cloud-First distributed scalable system, global engineering teams and driving architectural responsibilities. Before joining VMware, Jagjit worked at Concept Tapistry, Flexera, i2 technologies and a startup company.

# Hassle-free Privileged Access Management
Everything an MSP or IT team needs to secure privileged access to accounts, workstations, and applications.
[ Request trial ](https://www.idemeum.com/<http:/link.lab.town/trial>) [ Request demo ](https://www.idemeum.com/<http:/link.lab.town/demo> "Request demo")
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/home-3.png?fit=1674%2C1154&ssl=1)
Trusted by MSPs and IT teams worldwide
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/sysco-4.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/elastic-1.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/courant-1.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/myitinfy.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/exec.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/guru.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/lionic.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/stac.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/mear.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/puzzle.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/strata.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/idemeum.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/eberly.png?fit=500%2C250&ssl=1)
## New approach to PAM is long overdue
Legacy on-premises PAM products with account check-out tools are no longer suited for dynamic fast-paced environments. Lack on MFA protection, on-premises overhead, credentials copy-pasting, and lack of proper multi-tenant support are slowing down modern MSPs and IT teams.
[ About security ](https://www.idemeum.com/<https:/docs.idemeum.com/security-whitepaper/>)
##### Zero knowledge
Idemeum cloud does does not see your credentials – everything is encrypted on the client side.
##### Passwordless access
Every login and approval is protected with FIDO2 Passwordless MFA.
##### Cross platform
Works across resources – Windows, MacOS, Entra ID.
##### Integrations
Seamless one-click integrations with RMM tools, PSA ticketing, documentation platforms, and more.
## Discover idemeum products
No need to deploy point products – idemeum unifies privileged security products and plays nicely with your existing MSP stack.
#### Just-In-Time Admin Access
Meet compliance and cyber insurance requirements by eliminating shared accounts and moving to just-in-time access to workstations and Entra ID tenants.
[ Learn more ](https://www.idemeum.com/<https:/idemeum.com/just-in-time-admin-access/> "Learn more")
#### Endpoint Privilege Management
Discover admin accounts across your environments, remove local admin rights, and manage user elevation requests with powerful rule engine and mobile flows.
[ Learn more ](https://www.idemeum.com/<https:/idemeum.com/endpoint-privilege-management/> "Learn more")
#### RFID Single Sign-On
Manage access to shared workstations with RFID cards. Tap and go solution for workstations, web, and native Windows applications.
[ Learn more ](https://www.idemeum.com/<https:/idemeum.com/rfid-single-sign-on/> "Learn more")
## Works on Windows and MacOS
Idemeum offers a cross platform unified experience for Windows and MacOS workstations.
##### Cross platform
Idemeum offers the same unified JIT and EPM experience on Windows and MacOS.
![](https://www.idemeum.com)
##### Deploy in minutes
Deploy manually, with command line, or leverage silent installation with RMM or MDM.
![](https://www.idemeum.com)
## Platform demo
Take a look at how level can secure your MSP and your customers secure.
## Integrations
Idemeum offers inbound integrations with public APIs. We also offer seamless one-click integrations with various tools such as RMM, PSA, MDM, documentation tools, 3rd-party MFA and more.
[ Integrations ](https://www.idemeum.com/<https:/docs.idemeum.com/integrations/>)
![](https://www.idemeum.com)

generated_description:
**Idemeum: A New Age in Passwordless Access Management**

Idemeum is reshaping how small and medium businesses (SMBs) manage application access with a sleek, passwordless application management platform. Founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, this Palo Alto-based startup is laser-focused on simplifying access to SaaS applications.

### The Vision Behind Idemeum

Imagine a single platform where you can streamline employee access to all your apps without the hassle of multiple tools for SSO, password management, and access. That’s where Idemeum steps in. By integrating seamlessly with any HR system, Idemeum automates the onboarding process and account provisioning. Employees can use mobile device biometrics to log in to both free and paid applications, creating a frictionless user experience.

### What They Offer

Idemeum’s offerings revolve around three main products:
1. **Just-In-Time (JIT) Admin Access**: Compliant and secure, this eliminates the headaches of shared accounts by granting access only when it’s needed.
2. **Endpoint Privilege Management (EPM)**: It allows for admin account discovery, enhances local rights management, and streamlines user elevation requests, leveraging a powerful rule engine.
3. **RFID Single Sign-On**: A simple tap-and-go solution for accessing shared workstations and applications, making user authentication a breeze.

### Robust and Secure

The company's technology is grounded in a few key principles:
- **Zero-Knowledge Architecture**: Idemeum never sees your credentials; everything is encrypted client-side.
- **Cross-Platform Compatibility**: It works across Windows, macOS, and Entra ID.
- **Easy Integrations**: Instant compatibility with various remote management and documentation tools ensures a seamless setup.

Idemeum believes that the legacy on-premises PAM (Privileged Access Management) solutions are outdated. They slow down agile teams with their cumbersome processes. Instead, Idemeum’s approach brings speed, compliance, and robust security to the table.

### The Team and Community

With a small yet mighty team of six, Idemeum is agile and adaptive, ready to tackle the unique challenges of their clientele. The company is positioned in the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area, and they are already trusted by multiple MSPs (Managed Service Providers) and IT teams globally.

To dive deeper into their offerings or request a demo, check out their website at [idemeum.com](https://www.idemeum.com). Whether you're a small business looking to modernize your access management or an IT team in need of reliable tools, Idemeum might just be the answer to your password woes.
